The researcher, who disbelieved in our verses with what we have installed as evidence of the truth from a book and an argument, or the Qur’an.They are the companions of the one, meaning: the north in which the hardships or the pessimists are on themselves and otherwise.They have a great fire, and a highly covered fire (P-140).And the appearance of the words of Ibn Abbas, the nodd of the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the saying It was conducted in the sense of closed as well, and they were prepared on the limit of those who read the divorced woman, and he read other than seven: described by a thumb.It appears that it was described and it was said: It is permissible to be the one who is the one who was easy and the hamor said: Its chapters are closed, but it was closed to tighten the torment and the grace of God Almighty.And he stated that they are not.And they were considered a absence, as if they were not reconciled with the face of the faces, because they were referring to them, and they did not ask for this in the first place in the sentence in the sentence The believers.And it was quoted from Al -Shamni that he said: The wisdom is to leave the guarantee of the chapter in the first and the two things in the name of the indication that the name of the sign is brought in it to what I want to do with it.As his saying: This is the father of Al -Saqr, an individual in his merits ∗∗∗ from the descent of Shaiban between the lost and the peace, nor is it the same; The name of the remote signaling benefits the glorification to download the lifting of the place of which is referred to it, after its cod And their investigation as the month of the month, with the disagreement of the companions of the woman, and the guarantee does not benefit that.And in it is that the name of the sign is as it benefits the maximum, it benefits the opposition, as it is in the words of the Almighty: that is the one who calls the homosexuality and the fullness of the month, as it is in the goodness, as it is in the good What is forbidden from their investigation as the month of the month in evil.And in the course of what he mentioned, it is not something, and perhaps what we mentioned is the first, and it is planned.
